entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 6:57 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure: 98.0 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: S 48 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain and ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming south 70 gusting to 90 early this evening then west 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
